title: Zesty chicken with chips and chimichurri

ingredients.item: 1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for greasing

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200 ̊C, gas mark 6. Toss the sweet potatoes with the olive oil; season. Roast for 30 minutes until golden.
In a bowl, mix together the soy sauce, lime juice, 1⁄2 the chopped garlic and some black pepper. Toss with the chicken, cover and chill for 30 minutes.
Mix together the herbs, chilli flakes, green chilli, vinegar and shallot in a small bowl. Season and stir through the extra virgin olive oil.
Heat an oiled griddle or frying pan over a medium-high heat. Fry the chicken for 5 minutes on each side, until cooked through. Serve with
